ibis.io
Class SunSerializationOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.ObjectOutputStream
          ibis.io.SunSerializationOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
SerializationOutput, Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, ObjectOutput, ObjectStreamConstants
public final class SunSerializationOutputStream
extends ObjectOutputStream
implements SerializationOutput

The SunSerializationOutputStream class is the "glue" between SerializationOutputStream and ObjectOutputStream. It provides implementations for the abstract methods in SerializationOutputStream, build on methods in ObjectOutputStream. Sun serialization only requires an implementation of the java.io.OutputStream methods in the underlying DataOutputStream.

writeArray

public void writeArray(boolean[] ref,
                       int off,
                       int len)
                throws IOException
Write a slice of an array of booleans. Warning: duplicates are NOT detected when these calls are used! If the slice consists of the complete array, the complete array is written using writeUnshared. Otherwise a copy is made into an array of length len and that copy is written. This is a bit unfortunate, but a consequence of the Ibis WriteMessage interface.

Parameters:
ref - the array to be written
off - offset in the array from where writing starts
len - the number of elements to be written
Throws:
IOException - is thrown on an IO error.

writeString

public void writeString(String ref)
                 throws IOException
Description copied from interface: SerializationOutput
Writes a String to the output. A duplicate check for this String object is performed: if the object was already written to this message, a handle for this object is written instead of the object itself.

setReplacer

public void setReplacer(Replacer replacer)
                 throws IOException
Set a replacer. The replacement mechanism can be used to replace an object with another object during serialization. This is used in RMI, for instance, to replace a remote object with a stub. The replacement mechanism provided here is independent of the serialization implementation (Ibis serialization, Sun serialization).

Specified by:
setReplacer in interface SerializationOutput
Parameters:
replacer - the replacer object to be associated with this output stream
Throws:
IOException - is thrown when enableReplaceObject throws an exception.
